name: Untitled Morgan Game: A pal to the end
name_original: Untitled Morgan Game: A pal to the end
description: When Sofia dies in her own pool, it is up to her best friend, Mar, and her partner, Morgan, to revive her by embarking on a quest before Mar himself dies. They'll have to work together if they wish to bring back Sofia from her watery grave. Do you have what it takes to bring back Sofia or will she and mar remain sleeping with the fishes?
